attributes.action: divest the ex-chairmen of the failed banks of their knighthoods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign here if you agree with me that Sir James Crosby,Sir Fred Goodwin and Sir Tom McKillop should be stripped of their knighthoods following the catastrophic failure of their banks.I also believe that Lord Stevenson should be banned from the House of Lords.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
